content:
I'm glad you're committed to prioritizing your personal goal and self-care activities.

**Personal Goal: Project Planning**

* Allocate 30 minutes each day, Monday to Friday, to work on planning your project. This will help you make consistent progress and stay focused.
* Schedule this time slot from 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm, Monday to Friday. This way, you'll have a consistent routine and can dedicate a specific time to your project.

**Yoga Classes and Wednesday Walk**

* Tuesdays: Schedule your yoga class from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm.
* Thursdays: Schedule your yoga class from 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm.
* Wednesdays: Take a 30-minute walk during your lunch break from 12:30 pm - 1:00 pm.

Here's an updated schedule that incorporates your personal goal, yoga classes, and Wednesday walk:

**Monday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 1:00 pm: Work on the report
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm: Attend meeting
* 3:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 5:30 pm - 6:00 pm: Free time
* 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm: Dinner break
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Relaxation time

**Tuesday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work on the report
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm: Yoga class
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Dinner break
* 8:00 pm - 9:00 pm: Relaxation time

**Wednesday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work on the report
* 12:30 pm - 1:00 pm: 30-minute walk
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 5:30 pm - 6:00 pm: Free time
* 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm: Dinner break
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Relaxation time

**Thursday**

* 7:00 am - 8:00 am: Morning exercise (30 minutes) + meditation (30 minutes)
* 9:00 am - 12:00 pm: Work on the report
* 1:00 pm - 2:00 pm: Lunch break
* 2:00 pm - 5:00 pm: Work on the report
* 5:00 pm - 5:30 pm: Project planning (30 minutes)
* 6:00 pm - 7:00 pm: Yoga class
* 7:00 pm - 8:00 pm: Dinner break
* 8:00 pm
